faq.Question: When does the recruitment process start at IIT Indore?
faq.Answer: Recruiters can register for campus recruitment by contacting the Training and Placement (T&P) Cell through email or phone. They will need to provide company details and the job profiles they wish to recruit for.

faq.Question: In what ways can a company recruit students from IITI campus?
faq.Answer: Once registered, the T&P Cell will coordinate with the recruiters to schedule a suitable date for the pre-placement talks (PPTs), written tests, interviews, and other recruitment activities.

faq.Question: Are companies required to pay any fee to participate in the campus recruitment program at IIT Indore? / Is there any fee associated with the process?
faq.Answer: IIT Indore provides state-of-the-art facilities for recruitment drives, including auditoriums for PPTs, computer labs for online tests, and interview rooms for one-on-one interviews.

faq.Answer: Recruiters can register for campus recruitment by contacting the Training and Placement (T&P) Cell through email or phone. They will need to provide company details and the job profiles they wish to recruit for.
